response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value for me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am prepared to consider offers. Given its significance and the benefits it can bring to you, I propose a purchase price of $14,000. This offer is designed to be fair while ensuring a reasonable return for my investment. I look forward to discussing this further and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both parties.", "product_price": 14000}
